item.description:
Update: Due to a scheduling conflict, the Button Box downstairs classroom is not available on our original meeting date of Saturday, 10/18. Instead, our October Meetup will be held the following day, Sunday, 10/19.

Swap theme: By the Sea (see Sticky Note on Message Board for swap rules). All cards due by 1 p.m.
Special activity: 3 Windows and 1 Door (see red "Oct. 19 Meetup" note on Message Board for details). All cards due by 1 p.m.
Special activity: Mask-decorating! Blank half-masks supplied, or bring your own!

...plus ongoing activities:
"Jam" cards (see Sticky Note on Message Board for instructions)
Background swap (details on Message Board)
Challenge card displays (bring whatever you've got for display and scanning)
Retreat-activity displays (lots of stuff to show off here)

....and yet more to come!
item.how_to_find_us: Blonde hair, funky glasses, khaki apron--and a name tag.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: October Meetup in Wellesley--note date change to Sunday, 10/19
